name: Brian & Me
description:
Your dog has been dognapped and you must save them!  

Traverse a range of hazards to reach your dog.   If you take any damage, the dognapper will hurt your dog so be careful!

No dogs were harmed in the making of this game and we do no endorse animal cruelty.

Team:

Designer - Daniel Fairchild

Programmer/3D Artist - Bruce Gdula

Audio designer/Composer - Aran Everitt

Assets  used: 

Kenney  1 Bit Platformer

Kenney Microrougelike
